sentences.sContent: Patients maintain a strict dietary regimen.
sentences.sCn: 病人严格遵守饮食规律。

remMethod.val: regi ( = reg， 统治) + men → 自我统治之道 → 养生之道

words.tran: 政权，政体；社会制度；管理体制

trans.tranOther: a special plan of food, exercise etc that is intended to improve your health
